DOC.brief_title: Effect Gemfibrozil Safety Pharmacokinetics Red Yeast Rice Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , crossover study design 2 period use . The washout time period 4 day . In first period , 600 mg red yeast rice capsule ( LipoCol ) administer orally 240 mL water 8 AM . In second period , subject take 600 mg gemfibrozil ( two Lopid 300-mg capsule ) 7 AM 7 PM 2 day . On day 3 , subject take 600 mg gemfibrozil 7 AM 600 mg red yeast rice capsule administer orally 240 mL water 8 AM . The volunteer fast overnight , breakfast dinner sever 0.5 hour administration gemfibrozil . In addition , high fat breakfast serve 0.5 hour standard meal serve 4 10 hour administration red yeast rice ( LipoCol ) . The blood sample draw prior dose , 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 12 hour administration red yeast rice ( LipoCol ) detect plasma concentration lovastatin lovastatin acid . In addition , blood sample draw prior dose , 1 , 2 , 4 , 6 12 hour administration red yeast rice ( LipoCol ) detect plasma concentration creatine kinase ( CK ) co-enzyme Q10 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must age 2040 year old able sign inform consent prior study . 2 . Body weight must 45 kilogram ( kg ) within 20 +20 % ideal body weight . 3 . No clinically significant abnormality judge principal investigator base medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram , chest Xray , routine laboratory evaluation . 1 . Use prescription medication , overthecounter medication vitamin within 14 day prior dose . 2 . Participation clinical investigation within 2 month prior dose longer required local regulation . 3 . Donation loss 500 milliliter ( mL ) blood within 3 month prior dose . 4 . Presence liver disease ( Glutamic Oxaloacetic Transaminase ( GOT ) , Glutamic Pyruvic Transaminase ( GPT ) Totalbilirubin great 2fold normal value ) renal disease ( blood urea nitrogen ( BUN ) creatinine great 1.5fold normal value ) . 5 . Creatine kinase ( CK ) value great 1.5fold normal value . 6 . A known hypersensitivity statins fibrates analog . 7 . Permanent confinement institution . 8 . Individuals judge investigator coinvestigator undesirable subject reason .
